item.title: Reply to 'How do I include java stuff in .jar files?' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2121670/how-do-i-include-java-stuff-in-jar-files:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Reply to 'How do I include java stuff in .jar files?' on stackoverflow at https://stackoverflow.com/questions/2121670/how-do-i-include-java-stuff-in-jar-files:

Not sure how clojure is run, but don’t you just add the jar file to the classpath?

i.e.

/usr/share/java:/home/user/myjarfile.jar
